hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Limitations</a></li><li class="toc-item relative" data-depth="0"><a href="#legal-and-compliance" class="py-1 block font-medium hover:text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:text-gray-300">Legal and Compliance</a></li></ul></div></div></div><div class="relative grow box-border flex-col w-full mx-auto px-1 lg:pl-[23.7rem] lg:-ml-12 xl:w-[calc(100%-28rem)]" id="content-area"><header id="header" class="relative"><div class="mt-0.5 space-y-2.5"><div class="eyebrow h-5 text-primary dark:text-primary-light text-sm font-semibold">Get Started</div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center relative gap-2"><h1 id="page-title" class="inline-block text-2xl sm:text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 tracking-tight dark:text-gray-200">Introduction</h1></div></div><div class="mt-2 text-lg prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert"><p>Welcome to Envoyer, a zero downtime deployment service for PHP.</p></div></header><div class="flex flex-col gap-8"></div><div class="mdx-content relative mt-8 mb-14 prose prose-gray dark:prose-invert" data-page-title="Introduction" data-page-href="/introduction" id="content"><div class="card-group not-prose grid gap-x-4 sm:grid-cols-2"><a class="card block font-normal group relative my-2 ring-2 ring-transparent rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-background-dark border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 overflow-hidden w-full cursor-pointer hover:!border-primary dark:hover:!border-primary-light" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" href="https://envoyer.io/auth/register"><div class="px-6 py-5 relative" data-component-part="card-content-container"><div id="card-link-arrow-icon" class="absolute text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light top-5 right-5"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-arrow-up-right w-4 h-4"><path d="M7 7h10v10"></path><path d="M7 17 17 7"></path></svg></div><div class="h-6 w-6 fill-gray-800 dark:fill-gray-100 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100" data-component-part="card-icon"><svg class="h-6 w-6 bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light !m-0 shrink-0" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/user-plus.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/user-plus.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div><h2 class="not-prose font-semibold text-base text-gray-800 dark:text-white mt-4" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="card-title">Create An Account</h2><div class="prose mt-1 font-normal text-sm leading-6 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400" data-component-part="card-content"><span data-as="p">Create your Envoyer account today</span></div></div></div></a><a class="card block font-normal group relative my-2 ring-2 ring-transparent rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-background-dark border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 overflow-hidden w-full cursor-pointer hover:!border-primary dark:hover:!border-primary-light" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" href="https://laracasts.com/series/envoyer"><div class="px-6 py-5 relative" data-component-part="card-content-container"><div id="card-link-arrow-icon" class="absolute text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500 group-hover:text-primary dark:group-hover:text-primary-light top-5 right-5"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-arrow-up-right w-4 h-4"><path d="M7 7h10v10"></path><path d="M7 17 17 7"></path></svg></div><div class="h-6 w-6 fill-gray-800 dark:fill-gray-100 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100" data-component-part="card-icon"><svg class="h-6 w-6 bg-primary dark:bg-primary-light !m-0 shrink-0" style="-webkit-mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/circle-play.svg);-webkit-mask-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-mask-position:center;mask-image:url(https://d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net/v6.6.0/regular/circle-play.svg);mask-repeat:no-repeat;mask-position:center"></svg></div><div><h2 class="not-prose font-semibold text-base text-gray-800 dark:text-white mt-4" contentEditable="false" data-component-part="card-title">Watch More</h2><div class="prose mt-1 font-normal text-sm leading-6 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400" data-component-part="card-content"><span data-as="p">Watch the free Envoyer series on Laracasts</span></div></div></div></a></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="what-is-envoyer%3F"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#what-is-envoyer%3F" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">What Is Envoyer?</span></h2>
<span data-as="p"><a href="https://envoyer.io" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Envoyer</a> is a zero downtime deployment service for PHP. Some highlights of Envoyerâ€™s features include:</span>
<ul>
<li>
<span data-as="p">GitHub, GitLab &amp; Bitbucket Integration</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">GitLab Self-Hosted Integration</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Seamless Deployment Rollbacks</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Application Health Checks</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Integrated Chat Notifications</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Tuned for Laravel Apps</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Deploy any PHP Project</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Unlimited Deployments</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Deploy to Multiple Servers</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Cron Job Monitoring</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Unlimited Team Members</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Customize Your Deployments</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Import Your <a href="https://forge.laravel.com" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Laravel Forge</a> Servers</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="requirements"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#requirements" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Requirements</span></h4>
<ul>
<li>
<span data-as="p">Envoyer supports Ubuntu and FreeBSD servers.</span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p">The server must have <code>scp</code> installed.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="forge-integration"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#forge-integration" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Forge Integration</span></h2>
<span data-as="p"><a href="https://forge.laravel.com" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Laravel Forge</a> now offers a first-party integration with Envoyer. <a href="https://blog.laravel.com/forge-zero-downtime-deployments" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Learn more</a>.</span>
<div><div data-name="frame" class="frame p-2 not-prose relative bg-gray-50/50 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden dark:bg-gray-800/25"><div style="background-position:10px 10px" class="absolute inset-0 bg-grid-neutral-200/20 [mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#fff,rgba(255,255,255,0.6))] dark:bg-grid-white/5 dark:[mask-image:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(255,255,255,0.1),rgba(255,255,255,0.5))]"></div><div class="relative rounded-xl overflow-hidden flex justify-center"><span aria-owns="rmiz-modal-" data-rmiz=""><span data-rmiz-content="not-found" style="visibility:visible"><img src="https://mintlify.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/envoyer/images/forge-envoyer-integration-header.png" alt="Laravel Forge x Envoyer" class=""/></span></span></div><div class="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none border border-black/5 rounded-2xl dark:border-white/5"></div></div></div>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="envoyer-ip-addresses"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#envoyer-ip-addresses" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Envoyer IP Addresses</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">If you are restricting SSH access to your server using IP whitelisting, you <strong>must</strong> whitelist the following IP addresses:</span>
<ul>
<li>
<span data-as="p"><code>159.65.47.205</code></span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p"><code>157.245.120.132</code></span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p"><code>134.122.14.47</code></span>
</li>
<li>
<span data-as="p"><code>144.126.248.121</code></span>
</li>
</ul>
<span data-as="p">You may also need to whitelist the <a class="link" href="/projects/management#health-check-ip-addresses">Health Check IP addresses</a>.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="envoyer-api"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#envoyer-api" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Envoyer API</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Envoyer provides a powerful API that allows you to manage your servers programmatically, providing access to the vast majority of Envoyer features. You can find the Envoyer API documentation <a href="https://envoyer.io/api-documentation" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">here</a>.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="limitations"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#limitations" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Limitations</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">Envoyer is not necessary for applications running <a href="https://github.com/laravel/octane" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Laravel Octane</a>, as Octane already includes zero-downtime deployments out of the box.</span>
<h2 class="flex whitespace-pre-wrap group font-semibold" id="legal-and-compliance"><div class="absolute" tabindex="-1"><a href="#legal-and-compliance" class="-ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100 focus:opacity-100 focus:outline-0 group/link" aria-label="Navigate to header">â€‹<div class="w-6 h-6 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center shadow-sm text-gray-400 dark:text-white/50 dark:bg-background-dark dark:brightness-[1.35] dark:ring-1 dark:hover:brightness-150 bg-white ring-1 ring-gray-400/30 dark:ring-gray-700/25 hover:ring-gray-400/60 dark:hover:ring-white/20 group-focus/link:border-2 group-focus/link:border-primary dark:group-focus/link:border-primary-light"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="gray" height="12px" viewBox="0 0 576 512"><path d="M0 256C0 167.6 71.6 96 160 96h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C98.1 144 48 194.1 48 256s50.1 112 112 112h72c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H160C71.6 416 0 344.4 0 256zm576 0c0 88.4-71.6 160-160 160H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c61.9 0 112-50.1 112-112s-50.1-112-112-112H344c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24h72c88.4 0 160 71.6 160 160zM184 232H392c13.3 0 24 10.7 24 24s-10.7 24-24 24H184c-13.3 0-24-10.7-24-24s10.7-24 24-24z"></path></svg></div></a></div><span class="cursor-pointer">Legal and Compliance</span></h2>
<span data-as="p">OurÂ <a href="https://envoyer.io/terms" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Terms of Service</a> and <a href="https://envoyer.io/privacy" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="link">Privacy Policy</a> provide details on the terms, conditions, and privacy practices for using Envoyer.</span></div><div class="feedback-toolbar pb-16 w-full flex flex-col gap-y-8"><div class="flex flex-col gap-4 xl:flex-col xl:gap-6 min-[1400px]:flex-row min-[1400px]:items-center md:flex-row md:justify-end"><div class="w-full flex flex-col gap-y-6"><div class="flex flex-row gap-5 items-center grow justify-between md:justify-start xl:justify-between min-[1400px]:justify-start"><p class="text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400">Was this page helpful?</p><div class="flex flex-row gap-3 items-center"><button class="px-3.5 py-2 flex flex-row gap-3 items-center border-standard rounded-xl text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-700 dark:hover:text-gray-300 bg-white/50 dark:bg-codeblock/50 hover:border-gray-500 hover:dark:border-gray-500"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" class="fill-current"><path d="M10.1187 1.08741C8.925 0.746789 7.67813 1.43741 7.3375 2.63116L7.15938 3.25616C7.04375 3.66241 6.83438 4.03741 6.55 4.34991L4.94688 6.11241C4.66875 6.41866 4.69062 6.89366 4.99687 7.17179C5.30312 3.45616L10.0437 4.08116C9.86562 4.70304 9.58437 5.29054 9.2125 5.81554C9.05 6.04366 9.03125 6.34366 9.15938 6.59366C9.2875 6.84366 9.54375 6.99991 9.825 6.99991H14C14.275 6.99991 14.5 7.22491 14.5 7.49991C14.5 7.71241 14.3656 7.89679 14.175 7.96866C13.9438 8.05616 13.7688 8.24992 13.7094 8.49054C13.65 8.73117 13.7125 8.98429 13.875 9.16866C13.9531 9.25616 14 9.37179 14 9.49991C14 9.74366 13.825 9.94679 13.5938 9.99054C13.3375 10.0405 13.1219 10.2187 13.0312 10.4624C12.9406 10.7062 12.9813 10.9843 13.1438 11.1905C13.2094 11.2749 13.25 11.3812 13.25 11.4999C13.25 11.7093 13.1187 11.8937
